name: War Of Words (itch)
description:
Welcome to our game, dear guest!

Are you ready to fight for the title of the most erudite? Excellent!
Make new words from the letters of the word that will be offered to you. To turn a word into a magic card click on the "OK" button or enter/space. Each converted word deals damage.

So hurry up, suddenly your opponent knows a lot of words too...

Game, maked for Mix And Game Jam2020.
